title: Remove carbon–but do it equitably. Carbon removal mustn’t become a new frontier for injustice
dc:creator: Fletcher Harper, Cynthia Scharf
description: Fossil fuel interests and industrialized countries shouldn't monopolize the carbon capture debate, write Rev. Fletcher Harper and Cynthia Scharf.
content:encoded: Fossil fuel interests and industrialized countries shouldn't monopolize the carbon capture debate, write Rev. Fletcher Harper and Cynthia Scharf. Read More
